DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this retrospective study was to evaluate the incidence of SSI after colorectal surgery under the general anesthesia by different general anesthetic technique: inhalation versus total intravenous anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: TIVA, Inhalation Anesthesia, and Surgical Site Infection
DOC.criteria: Adult patients who underwent elective colorectal surgery under general anesthesia from January 2011 to December 2013.
